attributes.action: increase the cost of "Buy to Let", enabling a short term reduction in house prices to allow the younger generation to get on to the property ladder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The short-termism of allowing buy to let purchases has helped sky rocket house prices.

People should have smaller aspirations, by owning 2 to 200 properties is greed and unnecessary. All this does is create an unrealistic house price market. 

Please PM bring about changes in social attiudes to property ownership.

The next generations will be stuck with unrealistic mortgages if this is allowed to carry on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
